TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TcpServerChannel extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ISecurableChannel
Public Class TcpServerChannel Implements IChannel, IChannelReceiver, ISecurableChannel

summary.span: 針對遠端呼叫實作使用 TCP 通訊協定傳輸訊息的伺服器通道。

span.span: Implements a server channel for remote calls that uses the TCP protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道會傳輸訊息跨越遠端界限 （例如，電腦或應用程式定義域）。Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, computers or application domains). 類別傳輸使用的 TCP 通訊協定的訊息。The class transports messages using the TCP protocol. 通道會使用.NET Framework 遠端處理基礎結構來傳輸遠端呼叫。Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 當用戶端的遠端物件的呼叫時，呼叫會序列化成訊息是由用戶端通道所傳送和接收的伺服器通道。When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 然後還原序列化，並處理。It is then deserialized and processed. 任何傳回的值是由伺服器通道傳送，並由用戶端通道接收。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 若要執行額外處理的訊息在伺服器端，您可以指定的實作透過其中所處理的所有訊息的介面傳遞執行個體。To perform additional processing of messages on the server side, you can specify an implementation of the interface through which all messages processed by the instance are passed. 執行個體會接受二進位或 SOAP 格式中序列化的訊息。The instance accepts messages serialized in either binary or SOAP format. A物件具有相關聯的組態屬性可以設定在執行階段組態檔中 (藉由叫用靜態方法) 或以程式設計方式 (藉由傳遞集合建構函式）。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing a collection to the constructor). 如需這些組態屬性的清單，請參閱[通道和格式器組態屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For a list of these configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). > [!NOTE] > 如果在伺服器電腦正在執行 Windows 95/98/Me，不能指定為安全。If the server computer is running Windows 95/98/Me, the cannot be specified as secure. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用遠端使用型別。The following code example shows the use of a remotable type. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/remotable.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/remotable.cs#10)] 下列程式碼範例示範使用類別公開的遠端使用型別。The following code example shows the use of the class to expose a remotable type. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/server.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/server.cs#30)]

summary.span: 使用指定的通道屬性和接收，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified channel properties and sink.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需通道組態屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[通道和格式器組態屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). > [!NOTE] > 如果在伺服器電腦正在執行 Windows 95/98/Me，不能指定為安全。If the server computer is running Windows 95/98/Me, the cannot be specified as secure. 如果您不需要接收功能，設定`sinkProvider`參數`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式來建立與特定的組態屬性的物件。The following code example shows the use of this constructor to create a object with specific configuration properties. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpAuth#21](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpAuth/CPP/server.cpp#21)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpAuth#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpAuth/CS/server.cs#21)]

summary.span: 使用指定的名稱和會接聽指定的連接埠，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given name and that listens on the specified port.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式設定屬性使用`name`參數。This constructor sets the property by using the `name` parameter. 如果您想要註冊一個以上的通道，每個通道都必須具有唯一的名稱。If you want to register more than one channel, each channel must have a unique name. 若要要求可用的通訊埠動態指派，請設定`port`參數為 0 （零）。To request that an available port be dynamically assigned, set the `port` parameter to 0 (zero). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構。The following code example shows how to construct a . span.span: Gets channel-specific data.

value.span: 執行個體，包含通道專用資料。

span.span: A instance containing channel-specific data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然執行個體的形式傳回，這個屬性的值可以轉換成的執行個體描述的通道物件接聽。Although returned as an instance of , the value of this property can be cast to an instance of describing the channel to which the object listens. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用此屬性。The following code example shows the use of this property. span.span: Gets the name of the current channel.

value.span: 執行個體，包含通道的名稱。

span.span: A instance that contains the name of the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個已註冊的通道都有唯一的名稱。Every registered channel has a unique name. 名稱用來呼叫時，擷取特定頻道。The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用此屬性。The following code example shows the use of this property. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/server.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/server.cs#32)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChannelPriority As Integer
public: property int ChannelPriority { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前通道的優先權。

span.span: Gets the priority of the current channel.

value.span: 整數，表示指派給通道的優先權。

span.span: An integer that represents the priority assigned to the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 優先權會控制哪些通道資料會出現在次序執行個體，則會出現較低優先順序通道之前的較高優先順序通道。The priority controls the order in which channel data appears in a instance; higher priority channels appear before lower priority channels. 用戶端嘗試連接到伺服器中的通道中列出的順序執行個體。Clients try to connect to the server channels in the order that they are listed in the instance. 預設優先權為 1。允許使用負值的優先順序。The default priority is 1; negative priorities are allowed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用此屬性。The following code example shows the use of this property. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/server.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/server.cs#32)]

param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含存有遠端已知物件 URI 的 執行個體。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 從指定的 URL 擷取通道 URI 和遠端已知物件 URI。

span.span: Extracts the channel URI and the remote well-known object URI from the specified URL.
The URI of the current channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件的 URI 是唯一識別特定物件執行個體的值。The URI of an object is a value that uniquely identifies a specific object instance. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示使用此方法。The following code example shows the use this method. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel#23](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel/CPP/server.cpp#23)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel/CS/server.cs#23)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StartListening(object data) cil managed

span.span: Optional initialization information.

summary.span: 指示目前的通道在呼叫 方法以停止在通道上接聽之後，開始在通道上接聽。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to start listening on a channel after the method has been called to stop listening on the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式自動呼叫`StartListening`，因此您不應該呼叫這個方法，除非之前已呼叫過。The constructor automatically calls `StartListening`, so you shouldn't call this method unless was previously called. 呼叫`StartListening`已經接聽通道上可能會導致非預期的行為，應該予以避免。Calling `StartListening` on an already listening channel may lead to unexpected behaviors and should be avoided. 如果您的通道會使用動態指派的通訊埠編號，當您重新啟動接聽時，可能會變更連接埠號碼。If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening. 資料物件可以用來傳遞至通道的特定初始狀態。The data object can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果您不想將特定的狀態傳遞至通道，設定`data`至`null`。If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StopListening(object data) cil managed

param.name: data
param.span: 選擇性的通道狀態資訊。

span.span: Optional state information for the channel.

summary.span: 指示目前通道停止接聽要求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to stop listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要停止接聽通道上使用這個方法。Use this method to stop listening on a channel. 若要重新啟動接聽，請使用方法。To restart listening, use the method. 如果您的通道會使用動態指派的通訊埠編號，當您重新啟動接聽時，可能會變更連接埠號碼。If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening. 資料物件可以用來傳遞至通道的特定初始狀態。The data object can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果您不想將特定的狀態傳遞至通道，設定`data`至`null`。If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.
